properties.name: cache.caffeine.enabled
properties.description: Should the Caffeine cache manager be used?

properties.name: cache.caffeine.default-cache-name
properties.description: The name of the default cache base. If it is not defined, an eternal, unbounded default will be used instead.

properties.name: cache.caffeine.can-create-default-caches
properties.description: Can caches be created with default settings if they are unconfigured beforehand?

properties.name: cache.caffeine.caches
properties.description: The caches to be created and configured.
